Laurian Gridinoc wrote:
>
> Hello,
>
> On 07/09/06, Michael Stack <stack@... 
> <mailto:stack@...>> wrote:
> >  See the JMX overview in the manual getting started:
> >   
> http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/outside.html#mon_com 
> <http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/outside.html#mon_com>.
> >  The API is probably best viewed using the jconsole tool (See
> >  $JAVA_HOME/bin/jconsole in a sun jdk 1.5+). An example of how to do it
> >  from the command-line using the cmdline-jmxclient can be found in this
> >  message by our Igor:
> >  http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/2438 
> <http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/2438>.
>
> I get an importUris operation not found.
>












The importUris operation is available in the CrawlJob MBean, not in the 
Heritrix instance CrawlService MBean (Your listing below is from the 
CrawlService bean).  You'll see the CJ MBean appear after you start a 
crawl job.  Its type is CrawlJob or CrawlService.CrawlJob.

The cmdline-jmxclient source can be found in a directory adjacent to 
Heritrix source.  See here http://crawler.archive.org/cmdline-jmxclient/ 
for the cmdline-jmxclient lowdown.

Yours,
St.Ack


> I'm using Heritrix 1.8.0:
>
> java -jar bin\cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar foo:bar localhost:9999
> org.archive.crawler:guiport=8081 
> ,host=PCKM126,jmxport=9999,name=Heritrix,type=CrawlService
>
> List only:
>
> 09/07/2006 18:40:39 +0100 org.archive.jmx.Client
> Attributes:
> Status: Short basic status message (type=java.lang.String)
> Version: Heritrix version (type= java.lang.String)
> Operations:
> start: Start Heritrix instance
>   Parameters 0, return type=java.lang.Void
> stop: Stop Heritrix instance
>   Parameters 0, return type=java.lang.Void
> interrupt: Send thread an interrupt (Used debugging)
>   Parameters 1, return type=java.lang.String
>    name=threadName type=java.lang.String Name of thread to send interrupt
> startCrawling: Set Heritrix instance into crawling mode
>   Parameters 0, return type=java.lang.Void
> stopCrawling : Unset Heritrix instance  crawling mode
>   Parameters 0, return type=java.lang.Void
> addJob: Add new crawl job
>   Parameters 4, return type=java.lang.String
>    name=pathOrURL type= java.lang.String Path/URL to order or jar of 
> order+seed
>    name=name type=java.lang.String Basename for new job
>    name=description type=java.lang.String Description to save with new job
>    name=seeds type=java.lang.String Initial seed(s)
> addJobBasedon: Add a new crawl job based on passed Job UID or profile
>   Parameters 4, return type=java.lang.String
>    name=uidOrName type=java.lang.String Job UID or profile name
>    name=name type=java.lang.String Basename for new job
>    name=description type=java.lang.String Description to save with new job
>    name=seeds type=java.lang.String Initial seed(s)
> deleteJob: Delete/stop this crawl job
>   Parameters 1, return type=java.lang.Void
>    name=UID type=java.lang.String Job UID
> alert: Return alert at passed index
>   Parameters 1, return type=java.lang.String
>    name=index type=java.lang.Integer Zero-based index into array of alerts
> pendingJobs: List of pending jobs (or null if none)
>   Parameters 0, return type=javax.management.openmbean.TabularData
> completedJobs: List of completed jobs (or null if none)
>   Parameters 0, return type=javax.management.openmbean.TabularData
> crawlendReport: Return crawl-end report
>   Parameters 2, return type=java.lang.String
>    name=uid type=java.lang.String Job unique ID
>    name=name type=java.lang.String Report name (e.g. crawl-report, etc.)
> shutdown: Shutdown container
>   Parameters 0, return type=java.lang.Void
> log: Add a log message
>   Parameters 2, return type=java.lang.Void
>    name=level type=java.lang.String Log level: e.g. SEVERE, WARNING, etc.
>    name=message type=java.lang.String Log message
> destroy : Destroy Heritrix instance
>   Parameters 0, return type=java.lang.Void
> terminateCurrentJob: Returns false if no current job
>   Parameters 0, return type=java.lang.Boolean
>
> And I see that org.archive.jmx.Client source in not in heritrix 1.8.0 
> source download.
>
>
> Thank you,
> Laurian Gridinoc
>
>
